check.name: SummaryJavadoc
check.description: Checks that Javadoc summary sentence does not contain phrases that are not recommended to use. Summaries that contain only the {@code {@inheritDoc}} tag are skipped. Check also violate Javadoc that does not contain first sentence.

property.name: violateExecutionOnNonTightHtml
property.description: Control when to print violations if the Javadoc being examined by this check violates the tight html rules defined at TightHTML Rules.

property.name: forbiddenSummaryFragments
property.description: Specify the regexp for forbidden summary fragments.

property.name: period
property.description: Specify the period symbol at the end of first javadoc sentence.
